Package org.jcvi.jillion.assembly.tigr.contig

This package contains classes that can read and write TIGR .contig formatted contig data (also known as .ctg format).

See: Description

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    CtgContigDataStore  
    TigrContig  
    TigrContigDataStore  
    TigrContigFileVisitor
    TigrContigFileVisitor is a visitor interface to visit contigs of a TIGR .contig encoded file.
    TigrContigFileVisitor.TigrContigVisitorCallback
    TigrContigVisitorCallback is a callback mechanism to allow the TigrContigVisitor instances to communicate with the parser that is parsing the contig file.
    TigrContigFileVisitor.TigrContigVisitorCallback.TigrContigVisitorMemento
    TigrContigVisitorMemento is a marker interface that TigrContigFileParser instances can use to "rewind" back to the position in its contig file in order to revisit portions of the contig file.
    TigrContigParser
    TigrContigParser is an interface that will traverse a TIGR Contig formatted structure and call the appropriate visit methods on the given TigrContigFileVisitor.
    TigrContigRead  
    TigrContigReadBuilder  
    TigrContigReadVisitor
    TigrContigReadVisitor is a visitor interface to visit a single read inside contig from a TIGR .contig encoded file.
    TigrContigVisitor
    TigrContigVisitor is a visitor interface to visit a single contigs inside a TIGR .contig encoded file.
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    AbstractTigrContigBuilderVisitor
    AbstractTigrContigBuilderVisitor is a TigrContigVisitor that will create a TigrContigBuilder and populate it using the visit calls.
    TigrContigBuilder  
    TigrContigFileDataStoreBuilder  
    TigrContigFileParser
    TigrContigFileParser can parse TIGR ".contig" formatted files that are produced by legacy TIGR assembly programs.
    TigrContigFileWriter
    TigrContigFileWriter will write out Contig objects in ctg format.

Package org.jcvi.jillion.assembly.tigr.contig Description

This package contains classes that can read and write TIGR .contig formatted contig data (also known as .ctg format).
See Also:
.contig format
